CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Freight Train relative to Drone Pilots?
SRP.A: Freight Train is {below} Drone Pilots in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing International Routes relative to Long-Haul Operators?
SRP.A: International Routes is {below} Long-Haul Operators in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Hazardous Material relative to Night Shift?
SRP.A: Hazardous Material is {above} Night Shift in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total driver satisfaction?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {International Routes}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total driver satisfaction?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Hazardous Material}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Night Shift's maximum Driver Satisfaction in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Night Shift's maximum Driver Satisfaction is in {1979}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Freight Train's minimum Driver Satisfaction in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Freight Train's minimum Driver Satisfaction is in {1955}.

NC.Q: Between 1956 and 1958, was the average total Driver Satisfaction higher or lower than between 1975 and 1977?
NC.A: The average total driver satisfaction between 1956 and 1958 was {lower} than between 1975 and 1977.

NC.Q: Between 1955 and 1959, did the total Driver Satisfaction experience a larger or smaller change than between 1958 and 1971?
NC.A: The change in total driver satisfaction between 1955 and 1959 was {smaller} than between 1958 and 1971.

NC.Q: Was the total Driver Satisfaction in 1955 higher or lower than in 1964?
NC.A: The total driver satisfaction in 1955 was {higher} than in 1964.

NC.Q: Between 1958 and 1979, did the total Driver Satisfaction experience a larger or smaller change than between 1961 and 1973?
NC.A: The change in total driver satisfaction between 1958 and 1979 was {larger} than between 1961 and 1973.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {International Routes} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Night Shift and Drone Pilots first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Night Shift and Drone Pilots first exchanged leading positions in {1957}.
